column4: browsers still acting funny Firefox still won't access my yahoo mail account Konqueror does but only opens some emails same with opera can access account but wont open inbox
firefox works fine under windows xp on this machine:(
Are you running Hardy and have you updated to Firefox 3.0.1?
So, what exactly happens when you try to get into your Yahoo mail? Try running firefox in the terminal and reading the output as the program runs.
